articles.title: Stock Market News: Dow Set to Open Down - Barron's
articles.description: Dow, S&P 500, and Nasdaq futures are falling in premarket trading Wednesday as the stock market continues to rotate from Big Tech stocks to smaller caps.
articles.content:
U.S. stock futures were dropping early Wednesday as the prospect of lower interest rates shifted interest to smaller companies over the high-value technology firms that have recently driven gains.
